title: Earring Pendant
description: Gold earring – pendant a flat crescent with cable border; central panel with female head in profile to right in repousse flanked by filigree s-spirals. Attached to rim 4 loops from which depend chains of double-8 links ending in global glass beads, iridescent.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
